@lesterknome wrote:

  if (command.startsWith("spammer")) {
				yell("A MOTHER FUCKER IS SPAMMING AT HOME! SOMEONE HELP!" +playerName);
}

pretty easy

Lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 07:45:44 pm[/size][hr]if you get a error remove a ) next to spammer

item.title: Help me with a command please! its not working no matter what i do!
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“hell_killer, post:4, topic:360398”]try to use it like
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Spammer”)) {
sM(" “+playerName+” bla bla bla");
}[/quote]
that will make it only send to himself lol…

anyways what i was about to say.

ok first off all thats not how you do it, iam surprised u didnt get errors(maybe you did, you didnt tell me)
when you wanna add a player name to a message that the server sends you have to do it after the " so it would be like this
sendMessage(“You are the biggest faggot”+PlayerName); and if you want every body to see it you would do
this

System.out.println("A MOTHER FUCKER IS SPAMMING AT HOME! SOMEONE HELP"+PlayerName);

or

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+"A MOTHER FUCKER IS SPAMMING AT HOME! SOMEONE HELP";

one of those might work, depends on your base.

glad to help.

Read full topic
